mapper.insert: insert into ec_cust_cert (cust_no, cert_sqn, cert_typ, cert_no, acti_date, stop_use_date, cert_eff_date, desc_content, cert_issued_plece, orig_sys_flg, cert_sts, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certSqn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{certTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actiDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stopUseDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certEffDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certIssuedPlece,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{origSysFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ec_cust_cert set cert_typ = #{certTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cert_no = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acti_date = #{actiDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stop_use_date = #{stopUseDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cert_eff_date = #{certEffDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, desc_content = #{descContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cert_issued_plece = #{certIssuedPlece,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orig_sys_flg = #{origSysFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cert_sts = #{certSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cert_sqn = #{certSqn,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cust_no, cert_sqn, cert_typ, cert_no, acti_date, stop_use_date, cert_eff_date, desc_content, cert_issued_plece, orig_sys_flg, cert_sts, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_cert
select nvl(max(cert_sqn)+1,0) from ec_cust_cert where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
